SIMPLE SIGHT V2
suitabe for tank with high zoom level
known error: idk why but rangefinding number move depending on the tank

if you want another color, modify this (red, gree, blue, transparancy)

//Color
//RGB + A channel (max A is 255)
crosshairColor:c = 255, 255, 0, 255 //Day sight color
crosshairLightColor:c = 255, 255, 0, 255 //Night sight color

modified version of https://live.warthunder.com/post/1101996/en/

install it on
C:\Program Files\WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks

select the sight on
in-game > option > type sight in search bar > select sight

This project is no longer maintained but should work in future versions.

19/05-24 - ADDED PLZ83 AND PLZ83-130 - DOWNLOAD AGAIN
~HISTORICAL CHINESE SIGHTS~
W.I.P. - more vehicles will be added later on.

Pack includes:

  • ZTZ99-II/99-III/99A
  • VT-4A1
  • WZ1001
  • TOR-M1
  • ZLT11
  • ZTZ96/96A/96A (P)
  • PTL02
  • WMA301
  • MBT2000
  • T-69 II G
  • PLZ83
  • PLZ83-130

All sights use the correct reticle, but most sights lack limited FOV due to a lack of information and incorrect zoom values.

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXV...

SIMPLE SIGHT
modified version of https://live.warthunder.com/post/1101996/en/

install it on
C:\Program Files\WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks

select the sight on
in-game > option > type sight in search bar > select sight

Simple cross sight

Прицел очень простой, и я делал его для себя
В прицеле не показывается текущая дальность стрельбы, только на несколько секунд когда замерил, так что нужно постоянно сбрасывать дальность. В остальном очень хороший минималистичный прицел.

The sight is very simple, and I made it for myself
The scope does not show the current firing range, only for a few seconds when measured, so you need to constantly reset the range. Otherwise a very good minimalistic scope.

#sight #cross #crosssight

Musashi universal sight ( Azur Lane )

This one was may second choice, for the first Musashi sight that i made.

Hope you like it.

And as always, if you liked it. Leave a like, Thanks!

#sight #anime #musashi #azur_lane

This UserSight is based on a character from the mobile game Blue Archive. The original artwork isn't mine so credit to owner: @ui_shig (Twitter).

Feel free to request custom sights, but I can't guarantee that I will do it within short time period or not at all. But any comments, feedback, and request anything - I appreciate them.

source (Twitter): https://twitter.com/ui_shig/status/1690854417543974913

#bluearchive #blue_archive #anime #alltanks #all_tanks #mayoi_shigure #mayoishigure

Universal minimalistic sight based on the central crosshair of the Leclerc's optic with the addition of a small circle showing elevation.

With some other modern sights it can be difficult to arc shots over hills because you can't quickly tell where your barrel is actually pointing if the elevation indicator is off to the side or omitted completely, leaving you to waste a shell shooting the hill in front of your nose. This sight solves that by displaying a small circle at your elevation angle without adding too much visual clutter.

This sight is intended primarily for tanks with rangefin...

Type 60 ATM minimum engagement distance sight

FL: Where ATGM will try go when on flat surface

You need to bind "Crosshair Lighting" to change color to Yellow or change the default //Color setting in .blk

#type_60_atm #type60 #atm #type60atm

БМП-2. Исторические прицельные сетки для прицела наводчика и визира ПТРК.

Прицельные сетки под БПК-1-42 и 9Ш119М1. Шкалы "БР" пристреляны под подкалиберную ленту, а не бронебойную. Отдельно назначить разные сетки на пушку и ПТУР не получится на данный момент. Да, в жизни прицельная сетка пушки горит жёлтым, либо её вообще не видно. Сделано под разрешение 1920х1080, если это на что-то влияет.

Сетка ПТУРа не моя, позаимствовал тут https://live.warthunder.com/post/708194/ru/

Изменено 09.05.2024. Подсветка жёлтым теперь всегда включена. Скорректирован оттенок сетки.

TIRAN 4 SHARIR SIGHT REMAKE!!!

Hello guys, once again, long ago i didnt do anything about sights.
But today i finally come back after touching a lot of grass, to remake my first sight that was unhistorical unfortunately, it was for the normal tiran 4. But now i found a image of a real spreadsheet from the tiran 4sh and tiran 5sh, so now there its finally an historical sight!!

here all those rare letters meaning:

- תקביל = coaxial
- איינ = smoke
- מעיך = HESH (squash)
- חייש = APDS/APFSDS (subcaliber)
- חלול = HEAT-FS
- קו ח.ק. = idk lol, something like "kh....

Prinz Eugen universal sight ( Arzur Lane)

I made this sight because i really liked the original artwork
(source https://www.zerochan.net/2795264 )

As always if you liked it, leave a like. Thanks and till next time!

#sight #anime #azur_lane #prinz_eugen
